mapper.select: with info as (select sm.menu_id, sm.name, sm.path, r.status, sm.parent_id, r.delete_flag, r.role_id from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu r on r.delete_flag = sm.delete_flag and r.menu_id = sm.id) select menu_id, name, path, status, parent_id, delete_flag, role_id from info ${ew.customSqlSegment}
